website_summaries.verdict: The Philips Shoqbox Mini Bluetooth speaker earns high marks for its rugged design, dual-firing driver, and an impressive ability to reach loud volumes without distortion.
pros: Durable and splash-proof, the Philips Shoqbox Mini has an anti-clipping feature that can reach loud volumes without distortion
It's compact, easy to use, and has a built-in microphone for making conference calls as a speakerphone
cons: Battery life isn't great at 5 hours and the speaker isn't as waterproof as its marketing claims

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection failure
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks of use, bluetooth connection fails. My computer can see the speaker but cannot connect. I eliminated the computer as an issue by checking that drivers were up-to-date, connecting to another bluetooth device, and by removing and trying to reconnect to the speaker. I followed the sparse troubleshooting available from Philips. The speaker is no incapable of using bluetooth. Fortunately, I'm still in the return window, though I expected to get more than 3 weeks of use out of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jones

customer_reviews.title: but this sounds as good it is rugged enough to take with him when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's truck as it would fit in a cupholder. I don't think he ever used it in his truck and now has a truck with bluetooth anyway. Still he loves this thing. We have a few bigger ones, but this sounds as good it is rugged enough to take with him when he works on things. I find him using it outside while working on projects, in the man garage, in the guest room while folding clothes, and because it fits back in the kitchen drawer he has not even managed to lose it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Nice for shower or bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well in room with steam and moisture. Good sound. I listen to audio books and pod casts often and this projects the volume well. Nice design. So far so good re: battery life. Will update if this changes. I've had good success with other Philips brand wireless speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Esme000

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this speaker for two years now and it is still running strong. It has been submerged in water and dropped hundreds of times. For its size it puts out a lot of power, Only complaints are that there is no skip button on the speaker and that Bluetooth signal doesn't travel through water so if it is floating and there is anything but completely still water then it will skip in and out. It's battery life is about 4 hours when at 3/4 volume and it still plays that long after 2 years. I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a small, portable, durable, and waterproof speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Bducharme

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these, after a couple years the 3.5 mm jack wouldn’t work anymore however it still works on Bluetooth and since I use it both ways and its a great little speaker it was well worth buying another
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking and such
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace another one that had the speaker blow. They're not joking about the water resistance or about them floating but be wary about them bouncing around while in use. Hanging one from a strap by the attached loop and having it bouncing around while walking and playing was enough for the speaker to blow on one at maybe 3/4 volume.
customer_reviews.author: SPDan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Product had surprisingly good sound quality. It was advertised as water proof but the accompanying literature says to keep it away from water. Nevertheless, I love the sound quality and the portability. The range is limited to 10-15 feet. Despite it excellent sound quality, the product is poorly made. The original purchase lasted almost a year them failed to recharge. Phillips was good about replaces, but 3 replacements failed within 90 days. The forth replacement lasted 7 months. The units rechargeable battery is not replaceable and Phillips has no North American Hardware Support. This product should be sold as a disposable; it's not.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: The speaker on my phone is better
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get a speaker that I could use while working in the garage, or around my yard. What I got was a speaker that often lost connection to my phone, even though they were sitting next to each other, and a speaker that I couldn't turn up to halfway without the sound being distorted. Yes, it was super portable, but the audio quality was abysmal. I used the speaker for roughly 2 hours before giving up.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Addington

customer_reviews.title: Rugged doesn't matter if pickup/sound isn't that good
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bad receiver - music cuts off if anything is between the speaker and source. We wanted something for our toddler who loves music and was always trying to carry my jambox around, but this really is more annoying than anything. Rugged doesn't matter if it doesn't play well. We'd be better off with just giving him an old iPod than having to listen to this lost signal fritz. Jambox has way better sound too - but I just don't want to hand that over.
customer_reviews.author: Woxerina

customer_reviews.title: Good value, decent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a very good speaker with decent sound quality. Of course, they are better sounding speakers out there but not for this price point. Seems to hold up well as an outdoor speaker.
customer_reviews.author: John4857

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these a few years ago on a clearance rack to use in a church building with high vaulted ceilings. It sounded great! So when we began using a laptop to watch movies with an antiquated projector, I had to buy a second one to use at home. I was so happy to find this specific one! It's small size allows for portability, and omnidirectional sound reaches everywhere we need it to.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Noice
customer_reviews.text: I got tjis for my dad so many yrs ago when it was firdt sold for nesrly $70. Dropped so much it still kicks ass. I decided to get my own. These work great. Geeat sound
customer_reviews.author: eric..

customer_reviews.title: Great sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stream music from my phone while working and to be able to answer phone calls hand free while driving. The sound while playing music is great but when on a call it does not perform so well. The charge only last for about 4 hours before needing to be recharged. I still Highly recomend this product but if you plan on using it for more than 4 hours I do recomend a good power pack to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull
customer_reviews.text: for the price and size of this speaker, it sounds awesome. I use it in different rooms around the house and lately I've been taking it with me to the office and a place audios with high-quality. One side of the cylinder has a treble speaker in the back has a bass speaker. I'm telling you, you are not going to regret buying this. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Failed rapidly
customer_reviews.text: Initially met my expectations, however the speaker distorted like it was blown on the third use. It can only be listened to at very low levels without distortion and I mean low.
customer_reviews.author: PD3

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love my small speaker. I hang from the umbrella at the beach and it plays great. The charge seems to last reasonably well. I haven't actually put it in water so I cannot comment on its water resistance but I have used it at the beach after swimming and haven't had any issues. Small and portable. Pairs easily with my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size, good sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a small speaker and easy for me to transport around the house or outside to the patio. The sound is quite clear and I am very happy with it. If I needed it for a large situation, like to teach a class or to have a large loud party it wouldn't be enough but it suits my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: cathy a.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for such a small package, excellet and unique design
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, nice design. Could be a little heavier to alleviate the rattling it will do at high volume but the rubber feet on the bottom keep it planted. The sound is nice and crisp but it does not put out enough bass. This is typical for a small design like this so when I say that the bass is better than most units of this size, that's saying something.
customer_reviews.author: jedi105

customer_reviews.title: It pretty much accidentally falls in every time when in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this so we can listen to music in our pool and hot tub. I only give it a 4 star since it won't function for us in the water. We leave it either on the steps in the pool or the edge of the hot tub. It pretty much accidentally falls in every time when in the pool and the floating ability makes it easy to grab and put back up. It is usually paired with a Samsung Galaxy S 6 and I keep the phone 10-15' away.
customer_reviews.author: R Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming power to say the least.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker built into my motorola droid turbo is nearly as powerful as this unit. I can possibly play music ever so slightly louder than the phone but at that volume level becomes severely distorted. If planning on bringing this product out on a beach, lake or pretty much anywhere where there will be background noise think again. As to its water and impact resistance I cannot attest to any positive or negative comments.
customer_reviews.author: calarco3

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Works good, sound is clear, item has incredible battery life. Item is compact and lightweight, not blown away by the bass or music quality but does what it should. Only draw back is a pretty limited range for a blue tooth device. You can't get much more than 12-15 feet away with out the signal getting choppy. Other than that, great little speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Not waterproof at all!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk isn't waterproof at all! I used it only once at a pool and it stopped working. Don't buy it! Even when it was working it sounded really bad, with no bass at all and lots of distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Portable/durable
customer_reviews.text: While the size is equal to my closed fist, I thought it would be a bit larger. It does meets every other expectation. I recommend it for sound and durability.
customer_reviews.author: gcruz

customer_reviews.title: Sounded horrible
customer_reviews.text: I think I was sent a used speaker, sounded horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Knight

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Tunes
customer_reviews.text: I throw this speaker on the car seat or bench in the park and it works awesome for what it is: answer the phone, listen to tunes, and built like a tank! It is a remote speaker- no amazing bass... But good solid electronics and worth the $. You want amazing sound: get the RHA T10s! But for a wireless grenade, this is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Dmarcot110

customer_reviews.title: We are loving it.
customer_reviews.text: We have only owned it for a few days, but so far the volume, bass, and overall quality is fantastic. My wife and I have been searching for a versatile speaker for our iPhones and so far, we are loving this one. We have not tried the waterproof aspect yet (thought it has survived the shower a few times) nor have we tired a conversation with the built in mic.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Overton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little gadget it gives a lot of sound clear and precise. It was a gift to someone and they really enjoyed it. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Agape

customer_reviews.title: Just overall the best for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered about four of these now for various family members and they love them! Especially love the fact that they are waterproof trust me we’ve left these outside in the rain too many times and still works the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Durable! Kid Tested!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my preteen since she kept dragging my iPod stand into the bathroom for her showers and I didn't want it destroyed. After looking through many products and reviews we came across this one and 6 months later after several drops IN the shower, fully filled with water, and many drops on the concrete it still has great sound. We didn't have an issue syncing it and the controls are easy. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, well-built!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up during the 40% off sale. I gave it 5 stars because all around for its price, it is a solid product. Easy to setup, comes pre-charged out of the box and has a quality build. Even at max volume on the BT speaker and device you connect it to there is no crackling or distortion. For its size, it gets quite loud. You can check out my video review below:
customer_reviews.author: Chris Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Very surprised at how high you can turn the volume.  Much better than Brookstone.
customer_reviews.text: It's small, smaller than I expected, which I thought would be a bad thing, but it's great! I'm surprised at how loud it can get. It does seem to want to be very close to the smartphone, and I mean very close. I'm using my old iPhone 4 for the wifi. I've dropped it and didn't kill it. I love it! Beware, if you have kids they will want it for their own, but given the price... why not!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist ur $
customer_reviews.text: Rec 7/3 tod 7/19 unable 2 hear even plugged in. Not worth trouble to send back!
customer_reviews.author: sharon blocksom

customer_reviews.title: Purchase Worthy. Survived the wrath of Poseidon
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic little speaker! Really loud and great sounding without being distorted in quality. Lasts a long time. Showerproof is legit. Definitely a solid product that you don't have to pay out the wazoo for. I left it behind at a beach for two days, where high tide definitely got to it. And it survived! Still plays pretty well, despite dand and ocean water getting to it.
customer_reviews.author: Grebtur

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: This small speaker fits in your hand, has a long battery life and is rechargeable. It's gotten wet and dirty at the beach and dropped on the ground with no affect. Good sound for it's size. Uses a micro USB connection for charge and easy to connect your mobile to it with bluetooth. More than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chrisL

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be perfect for my limited uses
customer_reviews.text: I researched this speaker and read all the reviews. I thought it would be perfect for my limited uses. Well it just started cutting out and I have to shake it to get it to work. And even then it only sporadically works. It's never been dropped or even wet. Very disappointed. Going to explore the warranty but that's going to be a pain I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Hpdshark

customer_reviews.title: It's loud and waterproof enough to make your shower sound like a club
customer_reviews.text: It does not crackle, even at highest volume.It's loud and waterproof enough to make your shower sound like a club.I like that you can stand it up either horizontally or vertically and that by design, the plugs are covered by a silicone cap.cheaper than a brand new black one, which usually costs around $40, but it might because it's refurbished i love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding for its size
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding for its size. Use it on my sailboat. Loud enough to hear easily from about 15 feet away with moderate wind. While I hope I never have to test its water proof ness, it is great knowing it is protected from spray, mist and an occasional dunking! Worth the money. B+ sound A vaue
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hirschman

customer_reviews.title: eh its alright you should buy this...
customer_reviews.text: this speaker is loud! for its size at least but if you look at the instructions it says to keep it away from water they it says its water proof but in reality it is just water resistant its a nice little speaker
customer_reviews.author: Ginos Creations

customer_reviews.title: my husband is very pleased with this gift
customer_reviews.text: This small speaker packs a lot of punch! Unexpected - and so far, my husband is very pleased with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: Good shower speaker or stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.text: This puts out decent sound. For what I paid for it I couldn't be happier. Very durable and perfect for the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Technerd87

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Connects easily and quickly, has a long battery life, plays the music with good quality (even when at full volume) and has a decent bass. I was surprised at it's small size, but it really does pack a lot of power in it. I also like how it's super portable and strong (I've dropped it a couple of times with no ill-effects)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D'souza

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift to my mother in law
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law is in love with this! We bought it for her for christmas and she had us sit at the kitchen table for an hour guessing christmas song artists! Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and price but not the loudest
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound from a little speaker, good bass. Water resistant is such a great feature, portable and sleek design but the battery life has recently fallen off a cliff, I have had it for 2-3 years though. Wouldn’t always play when it floated on the water for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Phillips waterproof speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good waterproof speaker. The sound is good and loud enough for most. Good for use outdoors (or indoors) around water, rain, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JNTX

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Music Lovers on the Go
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product for my husband who has been taking it everywhere he goes. The sound quality is clear and the volume settings are perfect for an intimate setting or outdoor gathering. It's small enough to pack in anything, though we do wish that the battery charge lasted a bit longer than it does.
customer_reviews.author: DTagSunshine

customer_reviews.title: A great, little, tough, bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, the only caveat is the battery strength, it dies pretty quickly, only good for about two hours of music. Sounds great, looks great, is tough, and connectivity is awesome. Recommend this item for sure.
customer_reviews.author: therickyross

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It's louder than anticipated. outshined by the larger speakers, but it floats in the water with the speaker positioned upright, plays very very well & loud. An amazing outdoorsy speaker all in all. 5 stars for the product. I'd buy & recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great but only being able to charge it through your ...
customer_reviews.text: They just really need to get an adapter for this thing.It sounds great but only being able to charge it through your pc or maybe using an iphone adapter sucks.
customer_reviews.author: hunter27

customer_reviews.title: Good in real small places
customer_reviews.text: Good for small areas, as the acoustics isn't the best, not much bass. doesn't work very well away from your Bluetooth source, have to keep it fairly close. Want to use it on the paddle board on our pond, but it loses connectibilty after about 10 ft.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: great quality. very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Philips BT2200B/27 Shoqbox Mini Rugged Compact... Bday presnt for wife, over 18 months old. Daily use, great quality. very reliable, lasts about 7+ hrs. very good price. fast shipping. would buy from again...
customer_reviews.author: John G. Kierecki

customer_reviews.title: GREAT portable blue tooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sound and good volume from such a small unit. Good running time between charging. Good base for units size. Blue tooth hook up is very easy. Would buy again if I lost the one I own.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee Watson

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is nice but the volume is very low that my cell ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is nice but the volume is very low that my cell phone sounds louder than when is sync with the speaker i'm very disappointed with that I dont know if other buyers have the same issues or the product is defective even when I plug it with the cable the sound is the same so low and it looks like only one side of the speaker works. If someone else have the same issue please share you experience because Im thinking about the returned to the seller for defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 5 units and 2 of them had sound defects
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of the 5 units i bought had terrible sound distortions, specially when playing songs with bass/deep sounds. Getting 2 defective units out of 5 reflects a bad quality control from Philips. I will return them ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. I have one from a previous purchase 1 year ago. The sound is good and it is durable. Good value for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and the quality Phillips. Very happy with it and you can get it wet. Even throw it in a swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick J Dimattina Jr

customer_reviews.title: Sound is nice, but its not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up, the sound is of quality. But even at the maximum volume possible, it is not loud at all. My iPhone is louder! I'm returning it and finding something better.
customer_reviews.author: KPAR

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to drag around in camp and on the boat. Nice little unit for the price. Great sound. In fact, better than some much higher priced units. Loud enough for wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: Pomoxis

customer_reviews.title: Returned item due to poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: If it stayed charged for more that 45 mins it might have been worth it. Sound quality was good, not that loud but good enough for the size. Just never stayed charged!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: SMALL package.  HUGE sound
customer_reviews.text: God so much sound from so little a speaker. Waterproof is just an added bonus. Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Tambra B.

customer_reviews.title: it’s pretty small, and it’s held up really well so ...
customer_reviews.text: it’s pretty small, and it’s held up really well so far! it keeps its charge for a long while and the sound is solid.
customer_reviews.author: ella

customer_reviews.title: shallow sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice little speaker, does the job wish it had a little more low range i also had to buy a wall plug to charge it
customer_reviews.author: John Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Good for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a bit louder but I can’t ask for more from this little speaker. It works really well and the battery lasts long!
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Morazàn

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good. Volume was good
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. Volume was good. Device is water proof but the manual says to keep it away from water. Tested the product in the sink and it floated as intended. Had the device was submerged in water for 5 seconds then it broke. Returned it and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker for the Size
customer_reviews.text: So far it is just what I wanted. The sound (and use time) is not as good as my JBL Charge (which I think is incredible given its size); but given the size of the Philips (about half the size of the JBL) it is very good. It's great to stick in my suit case or carry-on for trips. I used in on a rafting trip down the Grand Canyon and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: DenverTechy

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: The sound was is awfull. Im pretty sure that something inside is broken, and it came like that beofre I got it.
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN DIAZ PTY 43324

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed as I thought I’d be from other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I like this speaker. Smaller than I thought..battery life sucks. Going to be paying the money for a better one hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound especially for the price. Easy to pair with and operate and even had a mic so that you can do speakerphone calls, if that's your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mack!

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty poor in seamlessly playing music through bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Audio quality is ok. It is pretty poor in seamlessly playing music through bluetooth. Constantly skipping, disconnecting, etc. (even from a range of 5 feet). Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luke davis

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely terrible buy. I didn't expect group sound
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely terrible buy. I didn't expect group sound; however, I did expect this to be able to work in water and survive a few trips to the beach. The speaker made almost no sound when left to float in the water and stop working completely after one trip to the beach. This speaker offers subpar sound and is far from rugged as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: It’s not good boys
customer_reviews.text: Bruh ima be real it got wet from a sink and stayed permanently distorted I should really just give it a 1 star lol
customer_reviews.author: OXGUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for bathrooms and small cookouts. Very loud for its size and transportable. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: It's soooo cute! And loud too..
customer_reviews.text: It may be little but the sound is certainly not. You must consider that when you are actually using it. It's perfect for placing it in your bike basket when going for a ride or using it at the beach. Initially I had a little trouble linking it up with my Iphone, but I think it was on my end (user error). I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kniely Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic blue tooth wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic blue tooth wireless speaker. The sound is really phenomenal and the charge lasts about a week. Very travel friendly, too. I put it just about anywhere in my suitcase or backpack. Very sturdy and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This little bluetooth speaker has excellent sound, is nice and portable and works great wherever I need it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works so good about another one last me about 10 hours of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so good about another one last me about 10 hours of movies. My line of work I have many hours to watch movies about the second one to use while the first one is charging. Great product definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: William Stepanek

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great for what it is and can clip onto her ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. OMG, you would have though I gave her gold. She loves this little speaker. It does exactly as it says it does. It sounds great for what it is and can clip onto her softball bag. My daughter plays travel softball and throws this in her bag, has dropped it, and takes it in the shower with her. So far, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynne Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Took it with me camping and a few times to the beach!! Great sound if you want portability
customer_reviews.author: Noelia Tevenal Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Great small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Remarkable sound for such a small speaker, pretty good base even. Also has good range. Worked well on my porch with phone shut up in house.
customer_reviews.author: jaki

customer_reviews.title: It can't handle bass and it mangles audio.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very weak speaker that cannot play bass passes 75% volume. Yes, its rugged and compact, but if it's basic function isn't good there is very little point to having it. Maybe its a good speaker if you are in a totally quiet environment, but I live in a city.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Maier

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to another BT speaker I previously owned, this one is awesome. Very loud and easy to pair. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vondiehmon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great purchase and I am very pleased with the product. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: ArdenHefren

customer_reviews.title: We have been extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is small enough to go anywhere with you. We have been extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Zortman

customer_reviews.title: Rock'n Roll.. Don't rock it because it will roll away.
customer_reviews.text: Durability : One Star round design allowed it to roll off the table. since it fell, the sound crackles non-stop. I got five showers and one pool party out of it before it rolled to its death. Sound Quality : Three Stars great mid range and high range audio. no brown notes at all (low tones). exactly what you would expect for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning it because I doesn't work properly. My phone is 20 ft away and the speaker keeps cutting in and out. When I put it in water like the picture it stops working and when I pull it out it starts working again.
customer_reviews.author: jenifer johnson

customer_reviews.title: not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: It's ok speaker , not bad at all. The reason I gave 4 stars cuz it not that loud from my expectations. If you don't mind, it maybe be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Volume is quite low. I bought this to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Volume is quite low. I bought this to use in my hottub, but with the jets going unless the speaker is very close it cannot be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: This was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. Worked well right away and the battery lasts a pretty long time with reasonable sound levels.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of sound of good quality. I wish it had a little more battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Zolinski

customer_reviews.title: Good waterproof speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I give this little speaker 4 stars it sounds great at low volume but not that great all the way turned up I took it floating down the river and submerged it it still worked was not as loud for about 3 hours then it was back to normal the Bluetooth connectivity is really easy to connect to all so
customer_reviews.author: Devin langhoff

customer_reviews.title: perfect! no regrets paying the $45!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! It's got clear sound for such a small unit. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fashionable

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is very handy. We have used it at many gatherings. People are always amazed at the output.
customer_reviews.author: bah

customer_reviews.title: I left it in for awhile
customer_reviews.text: None reasponsive its not working i pluged it in not working
customer_reviews.author: Seph

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality Glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality Glad I got it. Sounds better when placed on certain surfaces than others. And a bit tricky to sync with some devices though.
customer_reviews.author: R. McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better sound than most of the similar items... battery life was dissapointing though. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MeLoveYouDelongTime

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I use this when we go for walks. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: pwc

customer_reviews.title: If it was a little louder this would be the perfect speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I used it while biking, as well as kayaking and the water didn't seem to bother it. However, I bought this thinking that it was "waterproof" but it is actually only water "resistant" and is not able to ever be submerged in water. The sound quality is adequate. If it was a little louder this would be the perfect speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I havent tried it out in water yet, but gets fairly loud, no bass what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: had to return one sounded blown. replacement seems ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sassa

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sound does distort a little when at full volume. Has a range of about 15 feet before it starts losing signal. Great purchase for the price. Haven't tested if it floats or not yet... either way I got the 2 year protection plan for the additional $4.
customer_reviews.author: F.Nelsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little portable speaker. Potent and reliable on any environment. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

product_meta.title: Philips BT2200B/27 Shoqbox Mini Rugged Compact Wireless Waterproof Outdoor or Shower Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Black) Float in Water Technology and Built-In Mic for Phone Calls
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThis rugged and water resistant portable wireless speaker can go wherever you want to go, in and out, up and down, rain and shine. It sounds as powerful as it is tough.
feature_bullets: Advanced audio performance with a rugged design
Wireless music streaming via Bluetooth speaker
Built-in microphone for hands-free phone calls
Rugged, water resistant and floating, portable, made for the outdoors
Anti-clipping function for loud, distortion free music
